heading: 1 Our dataset
text: given following dataset fastq files generated (1) collecting 18 water samples rivers lakes near oil-sands extraction site province Alberta, Canada (see map ), (2) filtering water samples, (3) extracting DNA collected filer, (4) sequencing extracted DNA. sample collected, two different marker genes used amplify sequence distinct DNA regions : 12S ribosomal RNA gene mitochondrial cytochrome oxidase subunit (COI).Amplified regions details
